channel.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D
channel.description:
Hey all, I just wanted to let you all know - Stick Arena hacking is fun :D If any of you are interested in a trainer or anything, Ill post a link to it, or you can add me on MSN - meateaterr@hotmail.com.
For info on what thy hack does, thats a good question. It features [b]Health Hack, Speed Hack, Ghost Hack, Reload Hack, Anti-Lag hack, Mod Client hack, Black name hack, and you can make it seem like your logged it so no one can kick you if they know your cheating (they obviously will, too).[/b] It works great and I got rank 3 in 1 day/night. Its immensely fun shooting a shotty without reloading :D
Post, Discuss!
~Seemliss

item.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

Thanks Krich I’ve been looking for that for a long time XD.

lol mine had most of the basics

  • speed shooting/attacking (no lag)
  • walk through walls + speed walk
  • 99 kills (i never figured out how the hunter did the -1 deaths)
  • weapon hotkeys
  • auto kick
  • anti kick
  • multiple text (lag :P, not lik fetts though)
  • and other i’ve forgotten…

the trainer was written in VB i suppose

and was your accont of any colors the same one as err… STV or something, forgot it’s name. Lol i created a account called blanc(French for white) that was black.

Read full topic
item.source: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D

item.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

My own hack has

  • unlimited ammo
  • super speed (walking AND firing)
  • the only logical walk-through-walls hack I’ve ever seen
  • god mode
  • can’t be kicked
  • kick a player without votes from other players
  • cycle through weapons (guns on melee levels :D)

I have an independent program that can create accounts of any color.

I’ve just hacked at the actionscript - what is the difference between that and a “trainer” if any?

@sdcit: yeah, it’s some text from an easter egg in IE5 (and tangentially part of the solution to a +Ma riddle :D)

No fluffy warm creatures were maimed, dismembered, tortured, deplumed, discarded, deflowered, dropped, twisted, wrungOut, extended, respliced, broken, humiliated, irradiated, browbeaten, pickled, deluded, duped, detained, mishandled, desiccated, bronzed, belittled, coddled, expelled, deported, imbibed, elected, marginalized, placated, misrepresented, overworked, underpaid, underappreciated, prepackaged, overly petted, genetically altered, or cloned during the making of this product.

Read full topic

item.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D

@sdcit wrote:

J4kes Trainer is a bit errr… different from a hack pack. Hack packs usually have more hacks :P.

His anti-lag is really strange…

<3 sending multiple messages at once

item.source: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D

item.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D
item.dc:creator: @Seemliss Seemliss
item.description:
@Seemliss wrote:

Well, it is jakes, but im not advertising it really. I said if you wanted it, I have it. If I were advertising, Id be selling it, or giving his website or something. What I meant to mean was, if you hack too, talk about it, and if you want to hack, I have the trainer. BTW his trainer pwns. And anti-lag does what it says - it reduces lag. I dont know how, but it works. Because if you have speed hack on with anti-lag, you can run through walls. Plus, the log out thing basically logs you out, but keeps you logged in. Because everyone voted me off and it said I left, but i was still on the server

Read full topic
item.source: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D

item.title: Stick Arena - The hacks, by Me =D
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

That sounds very familiar… is that j4kes trainer… since if it is, you’d better have permission to advertise it

And Krichevskoy, from my exp. with Stick Arena Hacking, I think it just prevents you from being kicked out of the game because of lag (ftp?.. darn what was the name of that thing…) Still there are drawbacks, for example, you could disconnect from the game but still be connected in some way. Everyone else becomes frozen to you.

WTF, the forums said i double posted but there is no post…

EDIT: Oh yeh krichevskoy, was it you who had that signature back at kaitnieks that said something like: No cute, fuzzy creatures were tortured,hurt… etc. XD?

Read full topic
